name: World of Warships: Legends – Azur Lane: Dunkerque
name_original: World of Warships: Legends – Azur Lane: Dunkerque
description:
Azur Lane's Dunkerque brings anime flair to World of Warships: Legends, a free-to-play game that allows you to realize your wildest naval dreams by fighting players from all over the world! Fire the big guns of legendary ships and choose from a range of unique Commanders!

In this bundle: - Tier V Battleship Dunkerque - Unique Azur Lane Dunkerque сamouflage - Unique Azur Lane Сommander Dunkerque

Use your new Azur Lane ship and Commander to turn the tide in World of Warships: Legends!

If you already have Dunkerque, you'll receive compensation in the form of 10,000 doubloons. Content such as boosters, Commander XP, camouflages, etc. is only visible upon reaching a specific account level in the game.
